about: Hi, I'm Mapule Mbuzwana, an experienced Full Stack Developer passionate about turning ideas into digital solutions. I have a strong background in both building the parts of websites you see (front-end) and making sure everything works behind the scenes (back-end).

I specialize in creating easy-to-use designs for websites and setting up systems that handle lots of users without slowing down. Beyond coding, I love designing unique website templates that are both stylish and practical, aiming to make online experiences better for everyone. When I'm not coding, I enjoy relaxing with my favorite TV shows for inspiration. I also find joy in spending time outdoors, taking photos of beautiful scenery and going on refreshing hikes.

skills.title: Programming
skills.experience: Although I'm still learning, programming is an area I'm passionate about. I'm eager to dive into languages like Python, JavaScript, and Java. Every new language is a chance to expand my understanding and hone my skills.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: As a beginner in web development, I am currently learning HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. I'm excited to build my first applications and grow my skills in these foundational technologies.

skills.title: API
skills.experience: I'm starting to explore APIs, understanding how they act as a bridge between the front end and back end. Learning about securing, identifying, and authorizing user access through APIs using technologies like Django and ExpressJS is a thrilling journey for me.

skills.title: Database
skills.experience: I'm at the beginning of my journey with databases, both SQL-structured and document-based. I'm fascinated by the importance of data integrity and the role a well-structured database plays in application development.

hobbies.description: I started selling website templates and ended up falling in love with design and coding
I started reading stories online to pass time, but found myself writing my own story and sharing it

experience.description: I started working at Sportsmans Warehouse where I helped customers find items and sales.
I started working at H&M as a cashier. After 1 years, I worked as a fitting room attendant. I enjoyed meeting and helping new people, which made me gain a passion for work.
I worked at Excellent Hygiene as a receptionist and sales representative.  I developed an interest in coding and created my first website. This sparked my journey into web development.

testimonials.name: Mordecai
testimonials.quotes: Mapule is a brilliant developer with a love for solving complex problems efficiently.
